description: This file declares the interface 'IEventHandler' within the WPEFramework::Plugin namespace, defining virtual callback methods for various runtime and window management events.

classes.name: IEventHandler
classes.description: An interface with pure virtual methods for handling different runtime, window, ripple, and state change events.

methods.name: onRuntimeManagerEvent
methods.description: Handles runtime manager events; takes a JSON object reference as parameter.

methods.name: onWindowManagerEvent
methods.description: Handles window manager events; takes a JSON object reference as parameter.

methods.name: onRippleEvent
methods.description: Handles ripple events with a string name and JSON data.

methods.name: onStateChangeEvent
methods.description: Handles state change events; takes a JSON object reference.
